entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023
